name: Pizza Pug Game
description: A lovely pug with great hunger for Pizza. Careful! Veggies are extremely unhealthy.

name: Pastry App
description: A fancy app for checking juicy pastry recipes, create, update and delete your own recipes and leave some comments to support the community.
technologies: JavasCript, Express, Mongoose, Mongo DB, Node.js, Handlebars, validation keys for users and all CRUD action on models.

name: Laburo App
description: If you have a lot of tasks you need to organise, this is your app! :)
technologies: React.js, Node.js, Express for REST API, Mongo DB, Mongoose. I used fullCalendar.io package for the calendar and dates & MUI for styles
